title: T206 Clark and also a Smith trade or sell
author: JoeDfan

posts.post_title: T206 Clark and also a Smith trade or sell
posts.post_content:
I have a couple of T206 cards:
Josh Clark(e); PSA 3.5

And Smith (I have no idea what the first name is), Buffalo. This card is not graded, and I have no idea what it would come in at.

Anyone who know me here knows that I would rather trade for Joe Torre stuff I don't have; but if I have to, I would sell for $65 and shipping is on me.
Please note: I work during the week, and cannot usually get to the post office until Saturdays.
What's price on just graded card ?

Oh, I just saw this, sorry.

I was hoping to sell the pair together (or trade for Joe Torre!); but maybe if they don't sell by next week, I will sell separately.

However, I did have one other inquiry a couple of weeks ago for the same card; if I do split, I will have to give him first dibs.

Thanks,
Sean
